The deposit is below the {{minimum}} min: The deposit is below the {{minimum}} minimum required for the proposal to be evaluated
The deposit of {{deposit}} will be reser: The deposit of {{deposit}} will be reserved until the proposal is completed
The final recipient balance is less or e: The final recipient balance is less or equal to {{existentialDeposit}} (the existential amount) and will not be reflected
A fee of {{creationFee}} will be deducte: A fee of {{creationFee}} will be deducted from the sender since the destination account does not exist
Add a tip to this extrinsic, paying the: Add a tip to this extrinsic, paying the block author for greater priority
Include an optional tip for faster proce: Include an optional tip for faster processing
Do not include a tip for the block autho: Do not include a tip for the block author
